subject: Gymnastics
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Olympic gold medalist Shawn Johnson added the Sullivan Award as the nation’s top amateur athlete to her balance beam title at the Beijing Games. Johnson beat out her teammate Nastia Liukin, the all-around champion at the 2008 Games, and several others for the 79th annual award. She is the third gymnast to win the Sullivan, joining Kurt Thomas (1979) and Paul Hamm (2004). Other finalists were the United States Olympic men’s 400-meter freestyle relay swim team; the volleyball player Cynthia Barboza of Stanford; and the North Carolina basketball player Tyler Hansbrough.
